thread.title: Jay Z Spotted Leaving The Studio With Young Guru
thread.title_full: Jay Z Spotted Leaving The Studio With Young Guru

author: Kevin Goddard
title: Jay Z Spotted Leaving The Studio With Young Guru
text:
Home > Music > Jay Z Spotted Leaving The Studio With Young Guru Jay Z Spotted Leaving The Studio With Young Guru 1 0 Posted by Kevin Goddard , Feb 2, 2017 at 09:00pm Are Jay Z & Young Guru cooking up some new heat for us? 
It looks like Jay Z is trying to knock out some new music before his wife, Beyonce , welcomes their second & third child into the world later this year. Earlier this week, ATL producer Zaytoven confirmed that he & Hov have a collab on the way, quite possibly off both of their projects, and now more footage has surfaced of Hov leaving the studio last night with frequent producer Young Guru. 
Per usual, nothing was confirmed or revealed for that matter, but from the footage we can see Guru is holding a laptop, presumably with their work on it. Earlier this week, Zaytoven hinted that Hov has a new project on the way, and this just might be further evidence to back that statement. 
Peep the TMZ clip (below) and let us know what you think. Do you think Hov is cooking up some new heat? < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Feb 2, 2017 at 09:00pm 4 Views
